DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the immunogenicity, safety and tolerability of an H5N1 vaccine with a seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine, containing the strains recommended by WHO for the 2007 influenza season in the Southern Hemisphere.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity, Safety and Tolerability of Prepandemic Influenza and Seasonal Influenza Vaccine in Adult Subjects
